title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4101.31 - Compensation insurance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4101.31 - Compensation insurance

State Regulations

Every owner, driver or trainer who employs or hires any
person or persons required by the laws of the State of New York to be covered
by workers' compensation must file a certificate of insurance with the
commission on a form satisfactory to the chairman of the Workers' Compensation

Board. No license or permit will be issued to participate in harness racing
unless the commission has a certificate of insurance on file. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4101.31

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
